author: hustla187
title: Rare Pink Bike
review: The color pink is rare in Lego sets, but when it appears, it might be interesting like in this set. The pink bike is extremely rare and can be only found in a few sets and were also promos. If you do have this set, you are very lucky and should keep it.

author: Naylus
title: T for Too Good
review:
This set might be nothing special, but I still decided to buy it, when I got a chance. It's really pretty nice, mainly because it's an unusual bike. The colours aren't simply pink, it's actually dark pink. Not like in Paradisa series.

As for the minifig - it's a classic boy, nothing else, except that his arms are pink as well. As for the torso - here You have to use a sticker. Yes, the letter T on his front part is a sticker, as well as the one on his back.

I guess that's a good addition for those who enjoy sport theme in Lego.

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Town (Team Telekom) - Telekom Race Cyclist Review
review:
This is a nice little set to have and fun to play with as well. It may doesn't have any play features but it's still fun to build this. We also get a few stickers for the cyclist to put on which I didn't like. This bike is very easy to maneuver and this set is very useful if you want to build a bike team. It's a good little set to have - even for the bike and for the minifig which you can use for future MOC's (My own creations) and/or brickfilms.

All in all this set is an good set and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de
